posts.author: yamuchaop
posts.content: Hey all, what MP modules are recommended for online play? I used to play a ton back in the OG-SoU era, slowly stopping during HoU :)

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
I would heartily suggest the WoG offline Mod for grand MP busting fun!

Invite your friends, dirtnap together!

posts.author: Empyre65
posts.content: Several of us have been playing Mines of Twin Summit (MoTS) solo with characters that have finished the OC to get all the way to level 40, and enjoying it, but MoTS was designed for a party of characters starting at level 15.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
PWs tend to be pretty good, there are a few popular ones like Arelith, World of Greyhawk, Blackstone Keep
Its pretty simple, install required pre-requistes (usually in the NWN Vault) then connect, I use NWN EE, but there are a couple of 1.69 servers running
I went to World of Greyhawk due to the enjoyable balance combined with some challenge like Web but lots of fans for other places too
It just depends what you want
Aielund might be quite good for a multiplayer campaign lvl 1 to 36-38, I've heard of a few players doing that in groups.
